page.title: 04GOODLEIGH METHODIST CHAPEL
page.content: Built in 1880 it has 13 seats downstairs and has space to sit upstairs .We have a pulpit at the front,and in the corner beside the pulpit is a one manual organ . Underneath the pulpit there is a cupboard nobody has the key to.At the back of the chapel there are two rooms. One has the stairs leading upstairs. We used to have Sunday School there .We have got four senior children and eight juniors .In the chapel there was a big black open fire which sombody had to light early in the morning.Outside the chapel there is a toilet and wash basin and also a footscraper which was put there the same time the chapel was built .The service starts at 11.am and finishes at 12.pm .
